title: Failed to build opecv due to CMake Error: INSTALL(EXPORT) given unknown export "OpenCVModules"
body:
I failed to build opencv on CentOS 7 with GCC-5.4. Error messages said `CMake Error: INSTALL(EXPORT) given unknown export "OpenCVModules"`. The workaround show in http://answers.opencv.org/question/28283/cmake-error-installexport-given-unknown-export-opencvmodules/ worked for me. After adding `+core` spec, opencv has been built successfully.

I'd like to submit a PR in which `+core` is set to TRUE in opencv by default.

```
$ spack install opencv~eigen %gcc@5.4.0
```
